title: Lectures vpon the Epistle of Paul to the Colossians. Preached by that faithfull seruant of God, Maister Robert Rollok, sometime rector of the Vniuersitie of Edenburgh
author: Rollock, Robert, 1555?-1599.
publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, dwelling in Pater-noster row, ouer against the signe of the Checker,
notes: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
